net.bytebuddy.dynamic.loading

类 InjectionClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • net.bytebuddy.dynamic.loading.InjectionClassLoader
  • 直接已知子类:
    ByteArrayClassLoader

    public abstract class InjectionClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
    An injection class loader allows for the injection of a class after the class loader was created.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  InjectionClassLoader.Strategy
      A class loading strategy for adding a type to an injection class loader.

        protected InjectionClassLoader(ClassLoader parent)

    • 方法详细资料

      • defineClass

        public abstract Class<?> defineClass(String name,
                                     byte[] binaryRepresentation)
                              throws ClassNotFoundException
        Defines a new type to be loaded by this class loader. If a type with the same name was already defined, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        参数:
        name - The name of the type.
        binaryRepresentation - The type's binary representation.
        返回:
        The defined class or a previously defined class.
        抛出:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class could not be loaded.
